hadiths.text: Ali narrated:"Allah's Messenger (S) would pray four Rak'ah before Al-Asr separating between them with At-Taslim upon the angels that are close (to Allah) and those who follow them among the Muslims and the believers

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَرْبَعِ قَبْلَ الْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Four (Rak'ah) Before Asr
